question:
Which of the following political parties had contested elections held under the Government of lndia Act 1919 (Montagu-Chelmsford Reforms)?
1. Swaraj Party
2. Muslim League
3. Indian National Congress
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Government of India Act of 1919 introduced, for the first time, bicameralism. Swaraj Party and Muslim League had contested elections held under the Government of lndia Act 1919 (Montagu-Chelmsford Reforms).
